document_data.name: Great Griffon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Griffon''' was a great [[bell]] that hung in the [[Athkatla/Wave District|Wave District]] of [[Athkatla]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: The Great Griffon was a massive seven-ton bell that tolled during storms, signaling safe passage to Athkatla's naval vessels.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Great Griffon was infamous for often interrupting restful sleep in the Wave District's inns .
